BIO

Hi! I'm Srihari Vishnu, and I am currently a first year Software Engineering (BSE) Student at the University of Waterloo. I am a full stack developer with experience in creating Mobile applications, working with Raspberry Pi, and NodeJS. My technical skills include a strong background in the following languages: Kotlin, C++, Java, Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS. I have experience in using Android Studio, Xcode, Visual Studio Code, and Unity as development platforms. I am familiar with Swift, Tensorflow, and Git. Please feel free to reach out to me at srihari.vishnu@gmail.com for any opportunities or inquiries!
